title: Lawnmower

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Mow someone's lawn or mow their face off.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you mow someone's lawn, nothing will happen besides you visiting them. They will be happier that their lawn looks nice, but they will get no notification, and you will get no thanks.
- If you mow their face off, you will do a powerful attack, and their role will not be revealed upon death (I guess you just shred their ID or something).
- If you die, everyone will have the option to repair you.
- The first person who tells the host they will repair you will repair you, bringing you back from the dead. You are then on your repairer's team, and join their night chat if they have one.
- You can only be repaired once.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose you or win with your repairer.

desc:
Post 409
"Who forgot to turn off the lawnmower again?"
